Reviews.Title: “Worst hotel ever!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: xtreeemzbar
Reviews.Content: arrived booked online seeing pics etc hotel slum live checking fawlty people 2 30 mins key walked loosely called nearly passed ex storeroom beds thrown dirty walls aircon falling wall kitchen checked shut door looked bathroom dated cleanish watch champs league time hotel spoke reception guy told normal spain pics etc spoke spanish live gran admitted normal sorry etc etc game slept clothes tried sleep door badly fitted rattled night morning receptionist moved claim form tool service 1000 disgrace please dont am complainer 1st time life changed stayed dumps meant 3 key hotel hard rate 1 key hotel disgrace shame booking agents sell hotel yourselves favour dont touch barge pole

HotelInfo.Name: Apartamentos & Suites Internacional
